summary: severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus nonstructural protein-10 (SARS-CoV nsp-10) is the main transcriptase of SARS that cleaves polyproteins orf1a (187–260 kDa) and orf1b (345–422 kDa) during infection. the gene is expressed as two different isoforms, isoform A and isoform B, which are 220 and 147 amino acids long. expression of HEPIS was significantly higher in T-47D compared with ZR-75-30, MDA-MB-231 and MCF-7 cells (4). function of HEPIS in breast cancer cell proliferation has not yet been elucidated. psiCHECKTM2 (Promega Corporation) vector was cloned into the psiCHECKTM2 vector using XhoI (CTCGAG) and NotI (GCGGCCGC) restriction sites. the target siRNA sequences for human HEPIS were 5′-GATGCTAACCTCCAAGTTT-3′, 5′-GCAAGCAGCAGAAGAGAAA-3′ and 5′-AGTTTAGTCCTGCAGAT-3 pEGFP-C3-HEPISa, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb, or pEGFP-C3-HEPISb were seeded at a density of 7104 cells/well in 24-well plates. after 24 h of culture, the cells were transfected with 800 ng/well pEGFP-C3, pEGFP-C3-HEPISa or pEGFP-C3-HEPISb plasm the cells were transfected with 800 ng/well of either pEGFP-C3-HEPISa, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb or pEGFP-C3 for western blotting. at 24 h post-transfection, western blotting was performed as described previously. psiCHECKTM-2 vector MCF-7 cells were transfected with the psiCHECKTM-2 vector. at 24 h, the cells were lysed and cell lysates were assayed for firefly. the cells were seeded into 96-well plates at a density of 2103 cells/well. pNF-B-Luc was cloned into the 3′UTR of firefly luciferase. the internal control plasmid contained the Renilla luciferase gene. at 24 h post-transfection, the DLR assay was performed using the manufacturer's protocol. labeled complementary RNA (cRNA) was purified using the RNeasy mini kit (cat. no. 74106; Qiagen GmbH) as previously described (16). each slide (Agilent SurePrint G3 Human Gene Expression Microarray 860K) was hybridized with 600 ng Cy3-labeled cRNA. RNA was extracted using TRIzol® (Invitrogen; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.) and purified using RNeasy mini kit (Qiagen GmbH) total RNA (0.5 g) from each sample was used for first-strand cDNA synthesis using M-MLV reverse transcription kit (Promega Corporation) pEGFP-C3-HEPISa plasmid contained the CDS sequence of HEPIS isoform A. pEGFP-C3-HEPISa plasmid contained the CDS sequence of HEPIS isoform A. pEGFP-C3-HEPISb plasmid contained the CDS sequence of HEPIS isoform B. psiCHECKTM2 (Promega Corporation) vector was cloned into the psiCHECKTM2 vector using XhoI (CTCGAG) and NotI (GCGGCCGC) restriction sites. oligonucleotides were annealed and ligated into pSilencer 4.1-CMVneo (Ambion; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.) to construct HEPIS-specific siRNA expression the cells were seeded at a density of 1104 cells/well in 96-well plates. after 24 h of culture, the cells were transfected with 800 ng/well pEGFP-C3-HEPISa, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb or pEGFP-C3-HEPISb. cells were seeded at a density of 7104 cells/well in 24-well plates. cells were transfected with 800 ng/well of either pEGFP-C3-HEPISa, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb or pEGFP-C3 for western blotting. the psiCHECKTM-2 vector MCF-7 cells were transfected with the psiCHECKTM-2 vector as aforementioned. at 24 h, the cells were lysed and cell lysates were assayed for firefly and Renilla luciferase activity using a dual-Luciferase reporter assay system. pNF-B-Luc was cloned into the 3′UTR of firefly luciferase. the internal control pRL-TK plasmid contained the Renilla luciferase gene. labeled complementary RNA (cRNA) was purified using the RNeasy mini kit (cat. no. 74106; Qiagen GmbH) as previously described (16). each slide (Agilent SurePrint G3 Human Gene Expression Microarray 860K) was hybridized with 600 ng Cy3-labeled cRNA. analysis of differentially expressed mRNAs performed as described previously. RNA extracted using TRIzol® (Invitrogen; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.) qPCR was performed using 94°C for 15 sec, 60°C for 15 sec and 72°C for 15 sec for 40 cycles. the data of RT-qPCR and EdU cell proliferation assay were analyzed using Student's t-test. P0.05 was considered to indicate a statistically significant difference. pEGFP-C3-HEPISb plasmid contained the CDS sequence of HEPIS isoform A. the PCR fragments were cloned into the psiCHECKTM2 vector using XhoI (CTCGAG) and notI (GCGGCCGC) restriction sites. the target siRNA sequences for human HEPIS were 5′-GATGCTAACCTCCAAGTTT-3′, 5′-GCAAGCAGCA cells were seeded at a density of 1104 cells/well in 96-well plates. after 24 h of culture, the cells were transfected with 800 ng/well pEGFP-C3-HEPISa, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb, or pEGFP-C3-HEPISb plasmids. pEGFP-C3-HEPISb, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb, pEGFP-C3-HEPISb, si-control or pRL-TK were seeded at a density of 7104 cells/well in 24-well plates. after 24 h of culture, the cells were transfected with 800 ng/well of either pEGFP-C3-HEPISa, pEGFP-C3-HEPIS at 24 h, the cells were lysed and cell lysates were assayed for firefly and Renilla luciferase activity. at 24 h, the cells were seeded into 96-well plates at a density of 2103 cells/well. pNF-B-Luc reporter plasmid contains the NF-B response element. pNF-B-Luc was used to measure transcriptional activity of NF-B. the internal control pRL-TK plasmid contained the Renilla luciferase gene. RNA was purified using TRIzol (cat. no. 15596-018; Invitrogen; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.) RNA was amplified and labeled using the low input quick amp labeling kit, one-color (cat. no. 5190-2305; Agilent Technologies, Inc.) HEPIS, human embryo lung cellular protein interacting with severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus nonstructural protein-10. HEPIS overexpression reduces proliferation of MCF-7 cells. the results revealed that HEPIS expression was lowest in cells transfected with siHEPIS-3. qPCR analysis showed that overexpression of siHEPIS-3 significantly reduced expression of HEPIS at the transcriptional level. the knockdown of HEPIS by siHEPIS-3 significantly reduced the expression of HEPIS at the transcriptional level. RNA in situ hybridization was performed using a tissue microarray containing breast cancer tissue and adjacent normal tissue from 39 cases. HEPIS-positive staining was primarily found in the cytoplasm of case 2. the results of the CCK-8 assay indicated that overexpression of both isoforms of HEPIS in MCF-7 cells significantly decreased the cell proliferation compared with MCF-7 cells transfected with empty vector controls. the results revealed that HEPIS expression was lowest in cells transfected with siHEPIS-3.
